alert.note: Alert for Salt River and Wyoming Ranges (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 09 at 3:08PM MST until December 11 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM SUNDAY TO 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches across the northern half of the Salt River and Wyoming ranges. Snow accumulation will decrease farther south, with little to no accumulation expected across the southern end of the ranges. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Salt River and Wyoming Ranges. * WHEN...From 2 AM Sunday to 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, including in the backcountry.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
